mapper.sql: id, loginName, password, nickName, phone, mail, realName, cardNum, cardUrl, company, licenseNum, address, roleid, status, social_uid
mapper.select:
select
from t_user where (phone = #{phone} OR mail = #{mail} OR loginName=#{loginname}) and password = #{password}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, loginName, password, nickName, phone, mail, realName, cardNum, cardUrl, company, licenseNum, address, roleid, status, social_uid ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licensenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{socialUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
